ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, another young bard. :-) Your next climbing mission, should you choose to accept it, is the top of Kaladim.  The base of the statue is easy if you get lev
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, another young bard. :-)

Your next climbing mission, should you choose to accept it, is the top of
Kaladim. The base of the statue is easy if you get lev cast on you and run
around to the left-side wall facing Kaladim. But, if you've got a fast
enough PC & good enough connection, you can make it to the dwarf's nose if
you run from the uppermost ledge of the rock-thingy closest the statue. I
haven't done it myself, but then I haven't been to that continent since
getting a fast enough PC.

Incidentally, anyone with more geological knowledge than me know what those
tall rock thingies in Butcherblock are called?

Peace
Evulia, geological expert of 13 tunes, Tunare




"Heather
Boothby" To: <eqbards@egroups.com>

Please respond
to eqbards






WOW! Very nice climb. Gives me something to strive for. So far, I've
been up the wizard spires, and the RV bank, but than I'm only 13th, so have
a little while before I can attempt that one. Nice to know I'm not the
only dare devil bard around. Everyone thinks I'm nuts, but hey, it's a
great view up there. *smiles*

Willowlark
13th Bard
Karana Server
----- Original Message -----
From: Khelan
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 10:44 AM
Subject: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)


Well, I was slightly bored on Saturday, so I decided to climb the statue
of Firiona Vie in FV. Anything that tall is just meant to be climbed :).
I don't think it would be possible to anyone not a Bard, but it may be
possible. Visit http://www.clandlc.com/Firiona/ for screenshots and a
description of how I did it.

Hope a few of you try it yourself, it's a blast and a great view : )

--Khelan

eGroups Sponsor
